subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: U.S. striker Jozy Altidore scored three goals in the second half as the American team erased a 2-0 deficit to win in Sarajevo.
snippet: U.S. striker Jozy Altidore scored three goals in the second half as the American team erased a 2-0 deficit to win in Sarajevo.
